title: Prime Minister of Belgium - Wikipedia
snippet: Bart De Wever, the (former) leader of New-Flemish Alliance, was appointed as new prime minister on 3 February 2025. He is the first Flemish Nationalist to ever become Premier of Belgium.

title: Prime Minister | Belgium.be
snippet: An electronic Council of Ministers took place under the presidency of Prime Minister Bart De Wever.

title: List of prime ministers of Belgium - Wikipedia
snippet: The prime minister of Belgium (Dutch: Eerste minister van België; French: Premier ministre de Belgique; German: Premierminister von Belgien) or the premier of Belgium is the head of the federal government in the Kingdom of Belgium.

title: Bart De Wever - Wikipedia
snippet: Bart Albert Liliane De Wever (Dutch: [ˈbɑrt də ˈʋeːvər]; born 21 December 1970) is a Belgian author, historian and politician who has served as the Prime Minister of Belgium since February 2025.

title: Composition of the Belgian federal government | Belgium.be
snippet: Mr. Bart De Wever, Prime Minister Mr. David Clarinval, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Employment, Economy and Agriculture
